definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
full of sap (idiom); young and vigorous
the courage born of stirred emotions (idiom)

sentences.english: All flesh shall perish together, and man shall turn again unto dust.
sentences.chinese: 凡有血气的就必一同死亡，世人必仍归尘土。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up clinical experience of open hemothorax .
sentences.chinese: 目的总结开放性血气胸临床治疗经验。

sentences.english: Objective:To probe into the application of evidence-based nursing in collecting blood gas sample of elderly patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨循证护理在老年病人血气标本采集中的应用。

sentences.english: Strengthen blood vessel's ventilate ability , make eyes bright and spiritual.
sentences.chinese: 增强血管的通透性，令眼部血气充足，亮目怡神。

sentences.english: O thou that hearest prayer, unto thee shall all flesh come.
sentences.chinese: 听祷告的主阿，凡有血气的，都要来就你。

sentences.english: In old age, he should abstain from acquisitiveness.
sentences.chinese: 年老时血气衰弱，要警戒，不可贪得无厌。

sentences.english: For he remembered that they were but flesh; a wind that passeth away, and cometh not again.
sentences.chinese: 他想到他们不过是血气，是一阵去而不返的风。

sentences.english: O you who hear prayer, to you all men will come.
sentences.chinese: 听祷告的主阿，凡有血气的，都要来就你。

sentences.english: He remembered that they were but flesh, a passing breeze that does not return.
sentences.chinese: 他想到他们不过是血气，是一阵去而不返的风。

sentences.english: These be they who separate themselves, sensual, having not the Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那些引人结党，属乎血气，没有圣灵的人。

sentences.english: Seeing that many glory after the flesh, I will glory also.
sentences.chinese: 既有好些人凭着血气自夸，我也要自夸了。

sentences.english: To explore the clinic feature, treatment and prevention of delayed hemopneumothorax induced by thoracic trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸外伤迟发性血气胸临床特点及防治措施。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the intubating of double-lumen endobronchial tube with fiberobronchoscope and blood gas analysis.
sentences.chinese: 插管的引导作用及患者血气分析结果。

sentences.english: Every patients was observed for his heart and pulmonary function recovery, blood gas analysis and pulmonic pressure.
sentences.chinese: 观察心肺功能恢复情况，检查血气分析和肺动脉压力。

sentences.english: They are more courageous than older men and their hot temper prevents fear.
sentences.chinese: 比起老年人来，他们血气方刚，热情使他们毫无畏惧。

sentences.english: But everything here calls for solitude and the blood of young men.
sentences.chinese: 但在这里的每样事物都召唤孤独和血气方刚的年轻人。

definition: qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
the seven apertures of the human head: 2 eyes, 2 ears, 2 nostrils, 1 mouth
to vent one's anger on (an innocent party)/to take it out on (sb)
baleful look/inauspicious influence/(of a tire, balloon etc) to leak air
healthy environment/healthy atmosphere/righteousness/vital energy (in Chinese medicine)
